about_the_game:
Battle for honor and glory with the Season 15 Ultimate Battle Pass!

This bundle includes:

  • Premium Battle Pass + 20 Tiers

  • Earn up to 80 Mythic Prisms to unlock Mythic Zenyatta or other Mythic content

  • Bai Ze Kiriko and Toxic Doomfist

  • 2,000 Overwatch Coins

With your Overwatch Coins, you can purchase in-game cosmetic items to customize your heroes. Owners of the Premium Battle Pass can also use Overwatch Coins to unlock Tiers and instantly access Legendary and Mythic content. Tier skips will not apply to any battle pass level beyond level 80 and will not unlock prestige tiers. Any excess tier skips you purchase past level 80 are banked and will be automatically redeemed at launch of the following season. Mythic Skins and customizations are available for purchase with Mythic Prisms from the Mythic Shop.

Tier skips will not apply to any battle pass level beyond level 80 and will not unlock prestige tiers.
